attributes.action: Fix online petitions to stop non-UK citizens or residents signing petitions!
attributes.additional_details:
One must be a British citizen or a UK resident to create or sign a petition. However it is easy to by-pass the online checks for this by pretending to be a British citizen or a UK resident.

This seriously undermines the credibility of petitions because the number of signatories cannot be trusted.

Furthermore valuable government time and effort is wasted.

See: 
https://www.theguardian.com/politics/2016/jun/26/petition-for-second-eu-referendum-may-have-been-manipulated
attributes.background:
After the Brexit referendum flaws in this online petition system were identified whereby anyone in the world could easily sign petitions by pretending to be in the UK.

Please fix this!

rejection.details: Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action. You could start a new petition explaining clearly what changes you would like to be made to the petitions site.
